transArray.content: The newly opened Hanting Hotel has a smart device in the room, which allows you to open and close the curtains without getting up. The breakfast provided by the hotel is very delicious. The fried dough sticks fried by the elder sister are especially crispy and delicious. The millet porridge is also very sweet with red dates! I will stay here again when I come to Beijing in the future. The overall feeling is very satisfactory!

Hello, dear guests, may your four seasons be filled with flowers and plants in spring, little skirts in summer, dusk and fallen leaves in autumn, and sunshine and warmth in winter. I love you little man.
